briefdescription.para: Initialize the tool.

memberdef.argsstring: (const xAOD::ElectronContainer *electrons, const xAOD::MuonContainer *muons, const xAOD::JetContainer *jets, const xAOD::TauJetContainer *taus=0, const xAOD::PhotonContainer *photons=0) override
memberdef.name: removeOverlaps

detaileddescription.para: Top-level method for performing full overlap-removal. The individual OR methods will be called in the recommended order, and the considered objects will be decorated with the output result. Use this method form when the electron and muon containers are sufficiently loose for the tau-lep overlap removal.

memberdef.argsstring: (const xAOD::ElectronContainer *electrons, const xAOD::MuonContainer *muons, const xAOD::JetContainer *jets, const xAOD::TauJetContainer *taus, const xAOD::ElectronContainer *looseElectrons, const xAOD::MuonContainer *looseMuons, const xAOD::PhotonContainer *photons=0) override
memberdef.name: removeOverlaps

detaileddescription.para: Top-level method for performing full overlap-removal. The individual OR methods will be called in the recommended order, and the considered objects will be decorated with the output result. Use this method form when you're using view-containers or subset containers in order to provide the loose electrons and muons for the tau-lep overlap removal.
Remove overlapping electrons and jets This method will decorate both the electrons and jets according to both the e-jet and jet-e overlap removal prescriptions.

briefdescription.para: Remove overlapping muons and jets.

detaileddescription.para: Remove overlapping electrons and muons TODO: make it possible to veto event based on this.

briefdescription.para: Remove jets overlapping with taus.
Remove overlapping taus and electrons.
Remove overlapping taus and muons.
Remove overlapping photons and electrons.
Remove overlapping photons and muons.
Remove overlapping photons.
Remove overlapping photons and jets.
Input object decoration which specifies which objects to look at.
Output object decoration which specifies overlapping objects.
Input jet decoration which labels a bjet.
Flag to toggle overlap object links.
electron-jet overlap cone (removes electron)
jet-electron overlap cone (removes jet)

Electron ID selection for tau-ele OR.
Muon pt threshold for tau-mu OR.
Tau pt criteria divider for tau-mu OR.

detaileddescription.para: Flag to decorate electron if it shares a track with a muon

briefdescription.para: Flag to enable flag-running mode.
Input label accessor.
Output decorator.
B-jet label accessor.
Object link decorator.
Output decorator for flag-running mode of ele-muon overlap removal.
Input accessor for flag-running mode of ele-muon overlap removal.
Create a proper constructor for Athena.
Destructor.
Loose electron ID for tau-electron OR.
Loose muon ID for tau-muon OR.

detaileddescription.para: Determine if jet is flagged as a b-jet TODO: Use StatusCode?

briefdescription.para: Generic dR-based overlap check between one object and a container.

memberdef.argsstring: (const xAOD::IParticle *p1, const xAOD::IParticle *p2, double dRMax, double dRMin=0)
memberdef.name: objectsOverlap

briefdescription.para: Determine if objects overlap by a simple dR comparison.
Decorate p1 with an overlap object link to p2.

detaileddescription.para: Recommended calculation of overlap distance parameter, (delta R)^2. dR^2 = (y1-y2)^2 + (phi1-phi2)^2 Note this is calculated with the rapidity rather than the pseudorapidity. TLorentzVector::DeltaR uses the latter.

briefdescription.para: deltaR = sqrt( deltaR2 )
Check if object is flagged as input for OR.
Check if object has been rejected by decoration.
Check if object is surviving OR thus far.
Set output decoration on object, pass or fail.
Shorthand way to set an object as pass.
Shorthand way to set an object as fail.

detaileddescription.para: Check if output decoration has been applied to a container. Returns false if the container is empty. Output logic independent.

Helper method for ensuring proper initialization of output decoration. This implementation takes advantage of the default initialization of the decoration value. So, 'overlaps' is by default false. This method will not change the decoration value if it exists.

briefdescription.para: Helper method for setting all objects as passing.

detaileddescription.para: Following methods can be used to decorate an electron with an appropriate flag if it shares a track with a muon. It enables to rerun the full OR on skimmed/slimmed xAODs which do not contain the TrackParticleLinks anymore. The flag-writing and flag-running modes can be enabled via setProperty methods. Check if TrackParticleLinks are available in the input. Mainly needed if flag-running mode should be set automatically.

briefdescription.para: Check if input electron container is decorated with the flag for flag-running mode.
Check if electron shares track with a muon based on decoration.
Set output decoration on electron indicating if it shares a track with a muon.
Set output decoration on all electrons also those not qualified for OR. Default is false.

detaileddescription.para: This tool implements the harmonized object overlap removal recommendations from the harmonization study group 5, given in https://cds.cern.ch/record/1700874
This tool is deprecated and will no longer be supported. Please consider using the new OverlapRemovalTool in the ORUtils namespace.
